Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Munilla Construction Management is an "all-female company" when it is actually owned by five brothers.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Munilla Construction Management is an all-female company.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that women are not capable of doing construction work.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Munilla Construction Management is not an all-female company, as it is owned by five brothers.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the collapse of the bridge may have been caused by factors unrelated to the gender of the construction company.
